Variant Profession: Wronged

You have been the victim of a cruelty. Perhaps a dragon destroyed your home, fiends preyed upon your community, or a faction drove your family to ruin. No matter who or what it was that wronged you, you have devoted your life to finding revenge and putting a stop to their terror.

Ability Score Increase. Your Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution increases by 1. Your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma increases by 1.

Know Your Enemy. Pick a creature type (besides Beast or Humanoid) OR pick an organization that exists in the DM's world. You have advantage on any ability checks made to recall information about the chosen creatures, discern their intentions, identify evidence of their activity, and track them. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.RJVMK6N5NAS7H0IQ]{Know Your Enemy}

Skills. Choose two from: Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Religion, Survival.

Tool. You gain proficiency with one of the following: Disguise kit, Navigator's tools, Thieves' tools, Vehicles (land), Vehicles (water), or an artisan's tool.

Language. One of your choice (which should be assoicated with your chosen enemy, if applicable).
